Food.name: Kaiseki Cuisine
Food.description: A multi-course Japanese haute cuisine showcasing local ingredients and elegant presentation.
Food.recommend: Try it in a traditional ryokan for authenticity.

Culture.name: Gion District
Culture.description: Kyoto’s famous geisha neighborhood filled with tea houses and traditional wooden architecture.
Culture.recommend: Evening walks reveal Kyoto’s timeless charm.

History.name: Fushimi Inari Shrine
History.description: Renowned for its thousands of red torii gates winding through the forest.
History.recommend: Visit early morning to avoid the crowd.
